"payable","type":"fallback"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"activatePayout()":{"details":"Deliberately left open for any address to call This prevents over-reliance on a centralizing agent to activate a payout If the conditions are met (regarding time), anyone can activate a payout"},"endPayoutPeriod()":{"details":"Deliberately left open for any address to call This prevents over-reliance on a centralizing agent to end a payout If the conditions are met (regarding time), anyone can end a payout period Incentive to end the period is starting the countdown to the new payout with a fresh poolDividends not collected roll over to the next period"},"withdrawDividends()":{"details":"dividendsAllocated is computed by the percentage of all tokens owned by a user multiplied by the total value of the pool in ETHUsers can only collect dividends once per period Dividends not collected will roll over to the pool of the next periodUsers have t = payoutPeriod to withdraw their dividends before the payout  period can be closed and their dividends roll over"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"activatePayout()":{"notice":"'Switch' to activate dividend payout period"},"endPayoutPeriod()":{"notice":"'Switch' to end dividend payout period"},"nextPayoutPeriod()":{"notice":"Informs users when the next payout period can begin Can be used by a client to display a countdown"},"setToken(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the CertfyToken contract address - Used for initialization"},"withdrawDividends()":{"notice":"Allows users to withdraw their designated dividends for the period"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/yakkomajuri/GitHub/bootcamp-finalproject/eth/contracts/FeePool.sol":"FeePool"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/yakkomajuri/GitHub/bootcamp-finalproject/eth/contracts/FeePool.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1415d63a45dc1035d364492cad0649128e86bb2923cec721b839e88c93412244","urls":["bzzr://fbf47f19bc083fbe6a59dbd57e62f14b039754d9ef5074669ed4df2a7a6b270a"]},"/Users/yakkomajuri/GitHub/bootcamp-finalproject/eth/lib/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ccf2d7b51873db1ccfd54ca2adae5eac3b184f9699911ed4490438419f1c690","urls":["bzzr://1604f5b6d6e916c154efd8c6720cda069e5ba32dfa0a9dedf2b42e5b02d07f89"]}},"version":1}

nodes.name: nextPayoutPeriod

activatePayout().details: Deliberately left open for any address to call This prevents over-reliance on a centralizing agent to activate a payout If the conditions are met (regarding time), anyone can activate a payout

endPayoutPeriod().details: Deliberately left open for any address to call This prevents over-reliance on a centralizing agent to end a payout If the conditions are met (regarding time), anyone can end a payout period Incentive to end the period is starting the countdown to the new payout with a fresh poolDividends not collected roll over to the next period

withdrawDividends().details: dividendsAllocated is computed by the percentage of all tokens owned by a user multiplied by the total value of the pool in ETHUsers can only collect dividends once per period Dividends not collected will roll over to the pool of the next periodUsers have t = payoutPeriod to withdraw their dividends before the payout  period can be closed and their dividends roll over

nextPayoutPeriod().notice: Informs users when the next payout period can begin Can be used by a client to display a countdown

setToken(address,uint256).notice: Sets the CertfyToken contract address - Used for initialization

withdrawDividends().notice: Allows users to withdraw their designated dividends for the period
